player_news.trend_summary: AC Milan goalkeeper Mike Maignan was hospitalized after a head clash during their Serie A match against Udinese, a game Milan won 4-0. Following an overnight stay, Maignan has been released from the hospital and is returning to Milan.

player_news.trend_summary: Rafael Leão shined in Milan's dominant 4-0 Serie A victory over Udinese, scoring a goal and earning praise for his performance. Following the match, Leão, along with Gabbia, credited Milan's formation change for their improved play, while also sending messages of support to teammate Maignan after a head clash.
